entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being in a bad mood and glowering throughout the journey.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as bundling up Crookshanks in her cloak to protect him from the rain.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as a gigantic silhouette at the far end of the platform and is greeted by Harry.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is mentioned as being left with Ron's dress robes.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is bundled up by Hermione in her cloak to protect him from the rain.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as yelling out a greeting to Hagrid and seeing his silhouette at the far end of the platform.

relationships.description: Ron left his dress robes over Pigwidgeon as they left the train.
Hermione bundled up Crookshanks in her cloak to protect him from the rain.
Harry yelled out a greeting to Hagrid and saw his silhouette at the far end of the platform.
